text: Centropogon sodiroanus is a species of plant in the family Campanulaceae. ==Ecology== It is endemic to Ecuador where it is known by twelve subpopulations. It has three isolated subpopulations occur in Carchi, El Oro and Morona-Santiago. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist montane forests. It is threatened by habitat loss.Moreno, P. & Pitman, N. 2003. Centropogon sodiroanus. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
